item.title: Diagnosing MySQL deadlocks
item.description: An unpleasant exception Deadlock found when trying to get lock; try restarting transaction If you’re reading this document, you’re either here out of curiosity or necessity. I’ll be brief for those in the latter camp. When you encounter the above error in production, you only need the stack trace to figure out which query got blocked. What I have found is difficult to ascertain is which query is doing the actual blocking.
